title.rendered: NEWTECONS AFFIRMS ITS POSITION AS VIETNAM’S TOP PRESTIGE GENERAL CONTRACTOR

content.rendered:
In the afternoon, April 27, at Sheraton Hotel, Hanoi city, Ceremony to announce the list of Top 500 fastest growing enterprises in Vietnam in 2021 (FAST500), the list of top 10 prestigious Real estate, Construction and Building materials Companies in 2021.

It was held by Vietnam Report (VNR) and VietNamNet Newspaper – Ministry of Information and Communications. Newtecons was proud to be honored in Top 10 Most Reputable Building Contractors in 2021 and Top 50 Best Growing Enterprises in Vietnam.

The ranking of “Top 10 Most Reputable Real Estate – Construction – Building Materials Companies” is a result based on independent research and evaluation by Vietnam Report. The enterprises honored in the list are all effective, experienced, well-positioned in the sector. They have positive contributions to the development of the industry and are trusted brands by many people in the market.

According to Vietnam Report, in recent years, the socio-economic situation in many countries around the world has fluctuated, even Vietnam. The world economy is forecasted to experience the most serious recession in history, the growth of major economies has declined deeply due to negative effects of the Covid-19 pandemic. However, Vietnam’s economy still maintained impressive growth in this context, with GDP growth estimated to increase by 2.91%. This is a good sign affirming that many Vietnamese firms still maintain good business activities and high growth potential. Their business is creative and active with high community responsibility, thereby contributing significantly to the overall development of the country’s economy.

In 2020, overcoming many challenges, Newtecons continuously won a series of big projects, applied advanced sciences and technologies for optimization that helps to reduce time and minimize costs, at the same time, ensure the quality and progress of the work, bring the highest benefits to customers and partners.

The year 2021 is determined to be a pivotal and breakthrough year for Newtecons. Newtecons’ Board of Directors has outlined business strategies adaptable for each period. We continuously focus to enhance the solidarity of the workforce, improve construction activities, and keep up with market trends and demands that are the keys to help Newtecons continue to grow and maintain the position of the leading General Contractor in Vietnam, at the same time, bring the Newtecons brand to develop and reach the international market.
